entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Background Color for Label and entry does not update when removing the existing color #10177
  • .NET MAUI Blazor UWP doesn't not allow camera access through javascript library or functions. #10176
  • .NET MAUI button backgroundcolor dosen't work #10172
  • .NET MAUI Set iOS Linker Behavior to "LinkAll" throws XamlParseException: 'Position 9:37. Cannot assign property "Source": Property does not exist. #10171
  • MAUI Picker with White background looks like disappered? #10170
  • Shadow Breaks TranslateTo Animation on Android #10169
  • Image does not get cleared when its Source is set to null #10165
  • Maui Shell always re-uses pages. No option to re-create on navigation #10164
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Crash during Render after adding items to an ObservableCollection #10163
    Backlog
  • Implicit styles in App.xaml are applied too early, before the class's constructor #10162
    Backlog
  • Page.OnAppearing and OnDisappearing event on Windows is raised too often #10161
    Backlog
  • [Blazor,WebView2] HTML <select> dropdown Display In Wrong Position When Moving Window #10158
  • Cannot pair to mac after latest VS2022 Windows update #10157

Closed

  • Adding ZIndex to an Image causes the app to crash when released in .NET MAUI #10173
  • Allow layout manager replacement for existing layout types #9010
    .NET 7 Planning
  • `CollectionView` requires `ScrollView` #8097
    Backlog
  • Javascript drag & drop does not work when using a WebView control. #9983
  • [Bug] Generated PNG images not displaying #10149
    Backlog
  • About the maui project error after updating VS17.3.4 #10137
  • Infinity loop lifecycle when unfocused from the app between OnDisappearing and OnAppearing #9688
  • Unable to make a circle image with a circle border with a stroke thickness #10027
    Backlog
  • Android and iOS do not report Window.Frame values #9708
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Tizen does not report Window.Frame values #9707
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Setting the X/Y positions initial values on Window doesn't propagate when the window is first initialized #9703
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Screenshot capture does not work for Blazor MAUI #9718

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix insights from crashing when using Frame and CollectionView #10168
  • [Android] Fix crash navigating on Shell using a custom TitleView #10160
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Fix Semantic Property Propagation and CV TabStop #10156
    area/a11y

Merged

  • Allow custom layout managers for existing layout types in Controls #9980
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Windows] Fix Border clipping issue #10061
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10155
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Support Window.Frame on all platforms #10028
    7.0-rc2

Updated

  • Add visual state for PointerOver #10003
    area/Xaml </>, 7.0-rc2
  • Add release 6.0.536 #10129
    area/docs 📓, community ✨
  • [android] bring back `$(AndroidLinkResources)` by default #10153
    platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 7.0-rc2
